s0099: People called Yao worthy, because he yielded world to Xu You, Xu You not accepted, had yielded world name but actually not lost world.
s0100: Now Wang with country yields Zi Zhi, Zi Zhi must dare not accept, is Wang with Yao same walk.'
s0101: Yan Wang because entrusted country to Zi Zhi, Zi Zhi greatly heavy.
s0102: Someone said: 'Yu recommended Yi, already made Qi people officials.
s0103: To old, considered Qi people insufficient entrusted world, transmitted to Yi.
s0104: Already Qi with party attacked Yi, seized it.
s0105: World said Yu name transmitted world to Yi, already actually made Qi self take it.
s0106: Now Wang says entrusts country to Zi Zhi, officials none not crown prince people, is name entrusts Zi Zhi but actually crown prince administers affairs.'
s0107: Wang because collected seals self three hundred stone officials above gave Zi Zhi.
s0108: Zi Zhi south faced walked king affairs, Kuai old not listened government, turned became minister, country affairs all decided by Zi Zhi.
s0109: Third year, country greatly chaotic, hundred clans terrified.
s0110: General Shi Bei with crown prince Ping plotted, about attack Zi Zhi.
s0111: Various generals told Qi Min Wang said: 'Take advantage attack it, break Yan must.'
s0112: Qi Wang because made person told Yan crown prince Ping said: 'I heard crown prince righteousness, about abolish private establish public, regulated lord minister righteousness, clear father son position.
s0113: My country small, insufficient for before after.
s0114: Although, then only crown prince so command.'
s0115: Crown prince because gathered party assembled multitudes, general Shi Bei surrounded gong palace, attacked Zi Zhi, not conquered.
s0116: General Shi Bei and hundred clans returned attacked crown prince Ping, general Shi Bei died, displayed corpse.
s0117: Because constructed difficulty several months, died several ten thousand, multitudes terrified, hundred clans separated intentions.
s0118: Meng Ke told Qi Wang said: 'Now attack Yan, this Wen, Wu time, cannot lose.'
s0119: Wang because ordered Zhang Zi led five capitals troops, took advantage north land multitudes attacked Yan.
s0120: Soldiers not battled, city gates not closed, Yan lord Kuai died, Qi greatly won.
s0121: Yan Zi Zhi fled second year, Yan people together established crown prince Ping, this was Yan Zhao Wang.
s0122: Yan Zhao Wang after broken Yan then ascended position, lowly body thick bribes recruited worthy people.
s0123: Told Guo Wei said: 'Qi took advantage my country chaos attacked broke Yan, I extremely know Yan small strength few, insufficient to report.
s0124: But sincerely obtain worthy scholars with govern country, to snow previous wang shame, my wish.
s0125: Master see possible, obtain body serve him.'
s0126: Guo Wei said: 'Wang must wish bring scholars, first from Wei begin.
s0127: Moreover worthy than Wei, how far thousand li!'
s0128: Then Zhao Wang for Wei changed built palace served him as teacher.
s0129: Yue Yi from Wei went, Zou Yan from Qi went, Ju Xin from Zhao went, scholars contended went Yan.
s0130: Yan Wang Kuai dead asked orphan, with hundred clans same sweet bitter.
s0131: Twenty-eighth year, Yan country abundant rich, scholars troops happy brave light battle, then used Yue Yi as upper general, with Qin, Chu, three Jin united plotted attacked Qi.
s0132: Qi troops defeated, Min Wang went fleeing outside.
s0133: Yan troops alone pursued north, entered to Lin Zi, completely took Qi treasures, burned their palace chambers ancestral temples.
s0134: Qi cities not surrendered, only Liao, Ju, Ji Mo, rest all belonged Yan, six years.
s0135: Wu Cheng Wang seventh year, Qi Tian Dan attacked us, captured Zhong Yang.
s0136: Thirteenth year, Qin defeated Zhao at Chang Ping forty remaining ten thousand.
s0137: Fourteenth year, Wu Cheng Wang died, son Xiao Wang established.
s0138: Xiao Wang first year, Qin surrounded Han Dan released went.
s0139: Third year died, son now Wang Xi established.
s0140: Now Wang Xi fourth year, Qin Zhao Wang died.
s0141: Yan Wang ordered chancellor Li Fu allied pleased Zhao, with five hundred gold for Zhao Wang wine.
s0142: Returned reported Yan Wang said: 'Zhao Wang strong all died Chang Ping, their orphans not grown, can attack.'
s0143: Wang summoned Chang Guo Jun Yue Xian asked it.
s0144: Answered said: 'Zhao four battle country, its people accustomed troops, cannot attack.'
s0145: Wang said: 'I with five attack one.'
s0147: Yan Wang angered, group ministers all considered can.
